name: MUL
description:
http://github.com/modderme123/mul-py

Solve Sokoban puzzles by joining forces with a Motley crew of friends. They speak a different language, though. Below is the map between the keys on your keyboard and the symbols, as well as a dictionary so you know what to say (note that the delete key is a little dysfunctional, so you may have to press it multiple times).

'h': Hello
'hj': Goodbye
'plk': Purple
'pom': Blue
'pu': Green
'plu': Orange
'pln': Red
'pl': Yellow
'm': Move Right
'mn': Move Down
'mj': Move Left
'mk': Move Left
